reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: It\'s very useful for people learning Korean and I would recommend it to anyone. Some of the English expressions are a bit odd but the Korean isn\'t. It\'s also easy to customize so you can make it fit your learning style. Excellent!
reviews.author: A Google User
